titles: Some prison meditations in the 7th moneth, 1657. Being a free-gift sermon mainly touching the religious robbers, or spiritual murtherers, the sermon and prayer-sellers of the the former, later and present times; even to the whole company of mystery-Babylons merchants and members a warning.
author: Taylor, Thomas, 1618-1682.
publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread-eagle neer the west end of Pauls,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Society of Friends --  Apologetic works --  Early works to 1800.
Prisoners' writings, English --  Early works to 1800.
